titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of a Lyme Disease Awareness Month.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
4/25/2007--Introduced.
Expresses support for the goals and ideals of a Lyme Disease Awareness Month and for education and research efforts with respect to tick-borne diseases.
